Thanos should use the glove to fix all this plot holes....no character development,completely no script....poor special effects... only mass destruction without logic or any sense...
Awesome movie! Just go see it.

After 10 years this movie came out it was a gut puncher but the story was good and all the charters have good shared amount of time and it was the best MCU film or wasn't the worst it was an ok MCU film and over all if was a ok film the action was amazing the CGI for the HulkBuster armer looked fake Tom  Holland was amazing with his acting he made me laugh and he made he cry was this movie worth the 6 year wait after we saw Thanos for the 1st time and 10 years worth of seeing the MCU grow yes everything fits in the cast was so big but made it work this film will get from me will just be 4/5 stars

This movie was a little long, though I put Dark Knight in my top 5 superhero films of all time, I wanted Dark knight to end because it was so long, I didnt feel that with this movie probably because it was going a 100 miles an hour!! If you love action, you'll see some action displayed in this movie like none before it! Pure adrenaline!

Ten years of building up to this one moment that we have all waited for. Infinity War is truly epic and will become a fan favourite forever. Despite being somewhat bloated which was on my concerns going into this movie. However, there are a lot of elements that work in this movie such as the humour(somewhat wasn't expecting it to be lighthearted because THANOS!), the dramatic scenes hit me unexpectedly and in most of them I felt really invested in and most of all the villain, he was so developed, well crafted and his purpose portrayed perfectly(MARVEL VILLAIN PROBLEM SOLVED). I will not say much about the action scenes because you will gasp and awe at the cinematic mind blowing scene after scene of the most incredible shots ever put to film. To sum it all up, this movie does have it flaws in being bloated but it worth watching over and over again, you will not be bored, you will overlook these flaws and you will enjoy this movie for what it is: a made for fans but also has heart and beauty DC CEOS PLEASE NOTE THAT!
Great, Great,Great Job. all together at least.
